title: Bryan Adams
summary: Bryan Guy Adams OC OBC (born 5 November 1959) is a Canadian singer, songwriter, composer, guitarist, record producer, and photographer. Adams has sold over 100 million records worldwide, making him one of the best-selling music artists of all-time.[2][3][4] Adams was the most played artist on Canadian radio in the 2010s[5] and has had 25 Top 15 singles in Canada, and a dozen or more in each of the US, UK, and Australia.
